backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-report metadata listing feature IDs, titles, associated files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind layer defining Rose-Day-themed OKLCH color tokens, dark-mode variants, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the Rose Day title and loading Google Fonts plus the React main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the RoseDay page with a ThemeProvider enforcing light mode.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusicT: Button component that initializes, plays, pauses, and cleans up looping background music.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationScree: Empty placeholder file for a celebration screen component.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Empty placeholder file intended for a confetti animation component.
frontend/src/components/FallingRoses.tsx: Generates and animates multiple rose images falling across the screen with randomized properties.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Animates floating heart emojis rising from the bottom of the screen with randomized timing.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveRoses: Renders 12 clickable roses that toggle revealing predefined love messages in animated cards.
frontend/src/components/SparklesLayer.ts: Animates scattered sparkle particles with twinkling effects across the screen.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom rose-themed color variables, dark mode styles, and animations for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/RoseDay.tsx: Renders the full Rose Day page with rose-themed background, animations, interactive roses, messages, and footer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom rose color palette, typography, animations, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s state, goals, required features, and image assets for the Rose Day website.
